characters.name: Justin the Beaver
characters.description: A resourceful and curious young beaver determined to build a thriving dam.

characters.name: Acornelius the Squirrel
characters.description: A chatty squirrel who loves to gossip and hoard nuts. He has a knack for finding things.

characters.name: Whodini the Owl
characters.description: A wise but cryptic figure who provides hints and advice throughout the game.

characters.name: Megan the Fox
characters.description: A cunning predator who occasionally stalks Justin, creating tension and danger.

characters.name: Humans
characters.description: Represented as loggers or hikers, they can alter the environment in unexpected ways.
